article_title: That's Right North Carolina, A Potential 26% Average Rate Increase For Obamacare Customers

article_metadata.description: It's rate-filing season for health insurance companies, and this week marked the deadline for carriers to disclose and explain any proposed rate increases of ten percent or more for 2016 Obamacare plans sold on the individual market. Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina made the cut. As the state's [...]
